citations.narrative:
The water receptacle in the pasture where the sheep, goat, pigs and cow roam free was empty and had a crusty
sediment at the bottom of the receptacle.
****Clean Water shall be provided as often as necessary for the health and comfort of the animal.
****All water receptacles shall be kept clean and sanitary.
****To be corrected by 11-17-2014.
****An exit interview was conducted with the facility representative.
